title: Qualify a New Buyer Lead
description: A new lead comes in from the website. The agent needs to make initial contact and determine if the buyer is pre-approved for a loan.

tasks.description: Retrieve the new lead's contact information and property inquiry from the CRM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the new lead's details.

tasks.description: Contact the lead to introduce themself, understand their needs, and ask about their financing status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes contact and learns the buyer is not yet pre-approved.

tasks.description: Refer the lead to a list of trusted mortgage lenders to begin the pre-approval process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a helpful referral to the lead.
